executionPlan.name: AverageRequestsInflightFinder
executionPlan.description: This will average the number of requests in flight over a minute.
executionPlan.queryExpressions: from lbStats1#window.timeBatch(1 min) select cluster_id,partition_id, avg(in_flight_requests) as count group by cluster_id,partition_id insert into aggregated_requests_stats;
